snippet: FISHER--Marjorie. UJA-Federation of New York mourns the passing of Marjorie Fisher, who leaves behind a loving family who carry on a tradition of exceptional Jewish philanthropy. We extend our condolences to Marjorie's children, Mary Fisher, Phillip Fisher (Lauren), Julie Fisher Cummings (Peter), Marjorie Fisher Furman (Roy), and Jane Sherman (Larry); her grandchildren; her great- grandchildren; and the entire family. Alisa R. Doctoroff, President; Linda Mirels, Chair of the Board; Eric S. Goldstein, CEO 1/3
lead_paragraph: FISHER--Marjorie. UJA-Federation of New York mourns the passing of Marjorie Fisher, who leaves behind a loving family who carry on a tradition of exceptional Jewish philanthropy. We extend our condolences to Marjorie's children, Mary Fisher, Phillip Fisher (Lauren), Julie Fisher Cummings (Peter), Marjorie Fisher Furman (Roy), and Jane Sherman (Larry); her grandchildren; her great- grandchildren; and the entire family. Alisa R. Doctoroff, President; Linda Mirels, Chair of the Board; Eric S. Goldstein, CEO 1/3
